title: Does Swallowing Blood From Bleeding Gums While Fasting break my fast? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: she says if i'm fasting and i wake up and there's uh my gum is bleeding and there are there are dry traces of blood on my tongue or in my on my teeth in my mouth if you know that they exist you should not swallow that you should go and rinse your mouth and spit it out if you wake up unknowingly and you swallow any of it unintentionally your fasting is valid
